it has now been confirmed that there will be a three day seminar  
Featuring Japanese Swords and Armour at the Royal Armouries Leeds,  
England,  with talks by Leon Kapp, Yoshihara Yoshindo, Fujishiro  
Matsuo, Ogasawara Nobuo, Mr. Matsunaga (NBTHK), Clive Sinclair(TSGB),  
Dick Surran (JSSUS), Dr. Graham Curtis(NTHK), Mr. Ikeda (Tokyo  
National Museum) and Victor Harris to be held on October 28th, 29th &  
30th, 2006.
The Royal Armouries will be posting the information on their web site  
early March.



 From another list,
	and let me say we here in the States are quite jealous. This is a  
major event and a real coup for Professor Bottomley. You all should  
attend if you can and be sure to tell us all about it here on your  
favorite history list...
-t
